body:
Dear all,


Some of you will already have found out that there have been some
updates to the (temporary) 2010 Workshop page. It is available from the
link below, which also provides a mirror for all previous workshop
presentations


http://www.jaloxa.eu/mirrors/radiance_workshops/index.shtml


There have been some last-minute changes to the schedule, so if you spot 
any inconsistencies, or have anything to add, please get in touch with me.


Once everybody is reasonably happy with the page, it will be mirrored to 
LBNL and Fraunhofer (who are experiencing some problem with their
content management system).


Cheers


Axel
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2011-June/007889.html).</sup>
